text: Object respondsTo keys do:[:e| e print]

dev path:'/Users/mrsang/Documents/ushare/cwp/AFP51-LittleST/vm/test/dummy'.
dev size:1024.
dev open.
dev bytesDo:[:e|e print.
5 miliseconds wait
].
dev close.

[5 timesRepeat:[
'From child Process' print.
100 miliseconds wait
]] fork.
10 timesRepeat:[
'From parent Process' print.
200 miliseconds wait
]

node <- ROSNode new.
node name:'dummy'.
node master:'192.168.1.1' at:9393.
node name print.
node masterUri print.
node masterPort print.

node <- ROSNode new.
node name:'/dummy_node'.
node master:'192.168.10.100' at:11311.
node subscribeTo:'/chatter' type:'std_msgs/String' do:[:d| 'callback ' print].
node deploy.
node spin.

node <- ROSNode new.
node name:'/dummy_node'.
node master:'192.168.10.100' at:11311.
pub <- node createPublisher:'/talker' type:'std_msgs/String'.
i <- 0.
node deploy.
[node rosOk and:[i<100]] whileTrue:[
pub publish:('From st: ', (Date new) printString).
i<-i+1.
100 miliseconds wait
].
node rosToggle:false.

p <- JSONParser new.
obj <- p parse:'{"test":"ok" ,"result":1}'.
obj print
